body:
> BTW: I will release a Python version of falsecolor2 any day now, plus
> a wx GUI frontend.


Well, then, would you like some help? Because I was just starting on 
one and there's no point in duplicating your efforts.


I've got a short writeup on command line argument processing, but it is 
rather technical, and I think I will put it up on the developer's list 
instead.


Meantime, Greg, how would you feel about adding:
> The  -e  option  reads a script from its argument and -f reads a script 
> from a file.  -e and -f may be given multiple times and are  processed  
> in  the order they appear on the command line, The scripts are then 
> used to combine the images.
to the "falsecolor" man page? It would have helped me, anyway.


Randolph
